# Intro

![](https://media.giphy.com/media/drXGoW1iudhKw/giphy.gif)

This is what Hubble Space Telescope saw on my birthday. The image reveals the Whirlpool galaxy's skeletal dust structure, as seen in infrared light. You can visit [nasa.gov](https://www.nasa.gov/content/goddard/what-did-hubble-see-on-your-birthday) to check yours.

<img src = "images/december-2-2005.jpg" style="width:85%; border:10px solid">

# Zelda

This is the newest released conceptual picture of **the Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom**.

Here's a link to the [trailer video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2SNF4M_v7wc). It's coming May 12th, 2023. Really excited about it!
